WELCOME TO

TEN BILLION TREES TSUNAMI

Pakistan largest ever plantation drive

{/* 2nd section */}

About The TBTTP Project


The "Ten Billion Tree Tsunami" Programme is a government of Pakistan initiative which is being implemented by the Ministry of Climate Change with the support of Provincial forests and wildlife units. The Ministry of Climate Change is overseeing the program coordination, execution, supervision, and overall delivery of the program outputs and activities.
Reports suggest that Pakistan is among the most vulnerable countries on the Global Climate Index which has been recurrently impacted by catastrophes, made worse by the deteriorating climate conditions.

{/* Section 3 */}

3.29B

Planation target 2019-23

) } export default Body
